title: Legendre symbol
text: Given 2 integers a and p (1 ≤ a, p ≤ 1000000, p is prime) calculate theLegendre symbol(a/p).InputIn the first line the number of test cases t < 100000. Then t lines with the 2 integers a and p.Outputt lines with the Legendre symbol (a/p).ExampleInput:42 75 714 73 2Output:1-101
